slides.title: üë®‚Äçüíª STEP 6: Start main.py - Import & Config

code.snippet:
# File: main.py
# Parte 1: Imports e configurazione

import os
from dotenv import load_dotenv
from crewai import Agent, Task, Crew, Process
from crewai_tools import SerperDevTool, ScrapeWebsiteTool
from langchain_groq import ChatGroq

# Carica environment variables
load_dotenv()

# Configura LLM (Groq con llama-3.1-70b)
llm = ChatGroq(
    api_key=os.getenv("GROQ_API_KEY"),
    model="llama-3.1-70b-versatile"
)

print("‚úÖ Configuration loaded")
print(f"Using model: {llm.model}")

slides.explanation: Base setup: imports, env vars, LLM config with Groq.

slides.title: üë®‚Äçüíª STEP 7: Create the Agents (part 2 of main.py)

code.snippet:
# Parte 2: Inizializza tools
search_tool = SerperDevTool()
scrape_tool = ScrapeWebsiteTool()

# Research Agent - cerca informazioni online
researcher = Agent(
    role="Senior Research Analyst",
    goal="Discover cutting-edge developments in {topic}",
    backstory="""You are an expert researcher with years of experience
    in finding and analyzing technical information. You excel at finding
    reliable sources and extracting key insights from complex data.""",
    verbose=True,
    allow_delegation=False,
    tools=[search_tool, scrape_tool],
    llm=llm
)

print(f"‚úÖ {researcher.role} created with {len(researcher.tools)} tools")

slides.explanation: Research Agent: searches online with Google Search + scraping.

slides.title: üë®‚Äçüíª STEP 8: Analyst & Writer Agents

code.snippet:
# Analyst Agent - analizza dati del researcher
analyst = Agent(
    role="Content Analyst",
    goal="Analyze research findings on {topic} and identify key insights",
    backstory="""You're a meticulous analyst with a keen eye for detail.
    You excel at synthesizing information from multiple sources and
    identifying patterns, trends, and actionable insights.""",
    verbose=True,
    allow_delegation=False,
    llm=llm
)

# Writer Agent - scrive article finale
writer = Agent(
    role="Tech Content Writer",
    goal="Write engaging technical article about {topic}",
    backstory="""You're an acclaimed tech writer known for clear,
    concise, and engaging content. You make complex technical topics
    accessible to a wide audience without dumbing them down.""",
    verbose=True,
    allow_delegation=False,
    llm=llm
)

print(f"‚úÖ All 3 agents created: Researcher, Analyst, Writer")

slides.explanation: Analyst analyzes, Writer writes. Pipeline complete.

slides.title: üë®‚Äçüíª STEP 9: Create the Tasks (part 3 of main.py)

code.snippet:
# Parte 3: Definiamo i tasks
research_task = Task(
    description="""Research the latest developments in {topic}.
    Focus on:
    - Recent news and announcements (last 6 months)
    - Key technologies, frameworks, and tools
    - Industry trends and adoption rates
    - Real-world use cases and applications
    Find at least 5 reliable sources.""",
    expected_output="Detailed research report with sources and URLs",
    agent=researcher
)

analysis_task = Task(
    description="""Analyze the research findings and identify:
    - Top 3-5 most important trends
    - Key players (companies, projects, tools)
    - Practical implications for developers
    - Challenges and limitations
    Structure findings in clear, logical sections.""",
    expected_output="Structured analysis with key insights and trends",
    agent=analyst
)

print(f"‚úÖ Created {2} tasks (research + analysis)")

slides.explanation: Specific and detailed tasks. Clear output.

slides.title: üë®‚Äçüíª STEP 10: Writing Task & Crew Assembly

code.snippet:
# Writing task
writing_task = Task(
    description="""Write a technical article about {topic}:
    - Engaging introduction hook
    - Clear explanation of key concepts
    - Practical examples and use cases
    - Current trends and future outlook
    - Conclusion with key takeaways
    Target: 800-1000 words, technical but accessible.""",
    expected_output="Complete article in markdown format",
    agent=writer
)

# Assembla la Crew
crew = Crew(
    agents=[researcher, analyst, writer],
    tasks=[research_task, analysis_task, writing_task],
    process=Process.sequential,
    verbose=True
)

print(f"‚úÖ Crew assembled with {len(crew.tasks)} tasks")

slides.explanation: Writing task + crew assembly. Complete pipeline.

slides.title: üë®‚Äçüíª STEP 11: Main Execution Function

code.snippet:
# Parte 4: Funzione esecuzione principale
def run_research(topic):
    """Esegue ricerca multi-agent su un topic"""
    print(f"\n{'='*60}")
    print(f"üöÄ Starting AI research on: {topic}")
    print(f"{'='*60}")
    print("\nThis will take 2-5 minutes...\n")
    
    try:
        result = crew.kickoff(inputs={'topic': topic})
        
        # Salva su file
        filename = f"output/article_{topic.replace(' ', '_')}.md"
        os.makedirs('output', exist_ok=True)
        
        with open(filename, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            f.write(str(result))
        
        print(f"\n{'='*60}")
        print(f"‚úÖ Article saved to: {filename}")
        print(f"{'='*60}")
        return result
        
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"‚ùå Error: {e}")
        return None

slides.explanation: Main function with error handling and file saving.

slides.title: üë®‚Äçüíª STEP 12: Entry Point

code.snippet:
# Parte 5: Entry point
if __name__ == "__main__":
    print("\n" + "="*60)
    print("   CrewAI Multi-Agent Research System")
    print("="*60)
    
    topic = input("\nEnter research topic: ").strip()
    
    if not topic:
        print("‚ùå Topic cannot be empty")
        exit(1)
    
    result = run_research(topic)
    
    if result:
        print("\nüìÑ Preview (first 500 chars):")
        print("-" * 60)
        print(str(result)[:500] + "...")
        print("-" * 60)
        print("\n‚úÖ Done! Check the output folder for full article.")

slides.explanation: Clean entry point with result preview.

‚Üí Thought: 'Let me scrape the IBM article for details'
‚Üí [Repeats 3-5 times until it has sufficient info]
‚Üí Receives the report from the Researcher
‚Üí Identify top trends, key players, insights

slides.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Troubleshooting Common Issues
paragraphs: ‚Üí Check that .env exists in the root of the project
‚Üí Check that the key starts with 'gsk_'
‚Üí Virtual environment not activated. Run: source venv/bin/activate
‚Üí Add to task description: 'Use search_tool to find...'
‚Üí Groq should be fast. Check internet connection
‚Üí Set verbosity to False to speed up
‚Üí Be more specific in the task description
slides.ironicClosing: Debug = 80% of the time. Welcome to AI development.

slides.title: üìä Best Practices Learned
paragraphs: ‚úÖ Chain appropriately: Output task N ‚Üí input task N+1
‚úÖ Tools matter: Researcher has tools, Analyst/Writer does not
‚úÖ Verbose for debugging: True during development, False in production
‚úÖ Groq = free: Great for testing without burning the budget
